summary: Fixes the mismatched Glacier mesh brightness on Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the Glaciers on Solstheim by replacing them with the meshes from the original game. 

Depending on the ENB these were more or less quite visible. The mismatched up close mesh and lod version was even visible in the vanilla version of the game.

To install just use Nexus Mod Manager or extract the files and copy the Data directory in your Skyrim folder. 

To manually uninstall navigate to your Skyrim/Data/Meshes/dlc02/landscape and delete the glaciers folder.
author: exxxed
